title: adjunct_aw_tableize_roi_info.py
description: A simple helper function for the fat_proc scripts that generates a text file containing ROI count/size information based on provided atlases and masks.

warped_atlas.title: Warped atlas
warped_atlas.description: Warped atlas of interest, with subbrick selector if necessary

warped_mask.title: Warped atlas mask
warped_mask.description: Mask for the warped atlas (same grid)

reference_atlas.title: Reference atlas
reference_atlas.description: Reference atlas (unwarped), with subbrick selector if necessary

reference_mask.title: Reference atlas mask
reference_mask.description: Mask for the reference atlas (same grid)

modesmooth_value.title: Modesmooth value
modesmooth_value.description: Modesmooth value, from modal smoothing used after warping
